patterns.name: shadcn-vue component installation
patterns.description: Use `npx shadcn-vue@latest add <component> --yes` to install components. Dialog is automatically installed as a dependency of Command.

taskLogs.implemented: Integrated CommandPalette component in default layout. Added keyboard shortcuts for Cmd+K (Meta+k) and Ctrl+K to open the palette. CommandPalette is controlled via v-model:open.
taskLogs.learnings: useMagicKeys uses 'Meta+k' for Cmd+K on Mac. Need to register both Meta+k and Ctrl+k for cross-platform support.

taskLogs.implemented: Created CommandPalette.vue component wrapping shadcn-vue CommandDialog. Includes CommandInput for search, CommandEmpty for 'no results' state, and placeholder CommandGroups for Navigation and Actions with lucide-vue-next icons.
taskLogs.learnings: CommandDialog uses v-model:open for open state. CommandItem value prop is required for filtering.

taskLogs.implemented: Created useKeyboard composable using @vueuse/core's useMagicKeys. Provides onShortcut() to register key combos with automatic suppression when user is typing in input/textarea/contenteditable elements.
taskLogs.learnings: useMagicKeys returns ComputedRef<boolean> | undefined for key combos. Need to check for undefined before using with whenever().

taskLogs.implemented: Installed shadcn-vue Command component with all subcomponents (Command, CommandDialog, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList, CommandSeparator, CommandShortcut). Dialog component was also installed as a dependency.
taskLogs.learnings: Command component requires Dialog as a dependency. Both are installed together automatically.
